memberdef.argsstring: (std::string serial, int channel_mode, const std::string &filename, bool align_ch_phase)
memberdef.name: source_fpga_impl

parameterdescription.para: Antenna to set: None(0), LNAH(1), LNAL(2), LNAW(3), AUTO(255)

detaileddescription.para: Set NCO (numerically controlled oscillator). By selecting NCO frequency configure NCO. When NCO frequency is 0, NCO is off.
Set the combined gain value in dB

simplesect.para: actual gain depends on LO frequency and analog LPF configuration and resulting output signal level may be different when those values are changed

detaileddescription.para: Set the same sample rate for both channels.

Set TCXO DAC.
Care must be taken as this parameter is returned to default value only after power off.
LimeSDR-Mini default value is 180 range is [0,255] LimeSDR-USB default value is 125 range is [0,255] LimeSDR-PCIe default value is 134 range is [0,255] LimeNET-Micro default value is 30714 range is [0,65535]
dacVal
DAC value (0-65535)
Writes a parameter by calling LMS_WriteLMSReg()
Set GPIO direction by calling LMS_GPIODirWrite()

parameterdescription.para: Direction bitmap (eight bits, one for each pin, 1 = output, 0 = input)

detaileddescription.para: Write GPIO outputs by calling LMS_GPIOWrite()

parameterdescription.para: Level bitmap (eight bits, one for each pin)

detaileddescription.para: Read GPIO inputs by calling LMS_GPIORead()

simplesect.para: input level bitmap (eight bits, one for each pin)

detaileddescription.para: Enable the Preamble Detector in the datapath.

parameterdescription.para: Device number from the list of LMS_GetDeviceList.
